# xplor

> A unified framework for Operation Research modeling with polars

## Docs

### API Reference

#### Classes
> Core classes and types

- [XplorModel](reference/XplorModel.html): Abstract base class for all Xplor optimization model wrappers
- [VarType](reference/VarType.html): The type of the variable

#### Other
> Additional exports

- [var](reference/var.html): The entry point for creating custom expression objects (ObjExpr) that represent
